title: uche6215
author: uche6215
content: I greet everybody in this symposium, I want to use this precious opportunity that has been given to me to tell us all mostly the Nigerians, that we all only have 157 hours to the election. Please everybody should vote for the right person, we should not sell our rights to anyone no matter how huge the offering may be. I have suffered a lot in the country comprising you no matter how rich you are, we all have suffered in this country. Both known strong parties can't afford to lose this coming election. The labor party candidate isn't forcing anyone to vote for him because the new Nigerian is in the hands of the youth just as our ex-president GOODLUCK EBELE JONATHAN did. So please let's do what is right. My vote goes to PETER OBI, the obedient and well-respected man.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 19, 2023, 07:38:53 PMI greet everybody in this symposium, I want to use this precious opportunity that has been given to me to tell us all mostly the Nigerians, that we all only have 157 hours to the election. Please everybody should vote for the right person, we should not sell our rights to anyone no matter how huge the offering may be. I have suffered a lot in the country comprising you no matter how rich you are, we all have suffered in this country. Both known strong parties can't afford to lose this coming election. The labor party candidate isn't forcing anyone to vote for him because the new Nigerian is in the hands of the youth just as our ex-president GOODLUCK EBELE JONATHAN did. So please let's do what is right. My vote goes to PETER OBI, the obedient and well-respected man. Good to hear that your vote goes to PETER OBI, everyone has the person wish to vote for, this coming election will be a very tough this time, due to some things I'm seeing, but what I have for my fellow people is that any one who try to give you money or bribe you, collect the money and vote anybody of your choice, now that money is the issue of Nigeria now, I guess no one will follow you to where you will put your tumb and vote and see maybe you vote for who you are giving money to vote for, don't let any one to use you this time.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: We know what is right, we know who is best for the job, but our problem now is INEC and other presidential candidates which is tinubu and Atiku i don't trust them, they have money and they are ready to do anything possible to make sure they acquire this presidency.I urge every youth to come out in mass and vote peter obi, and I pray INEC Should do the right thing for our votes to be counted....

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Some thoughts have running through my mind during this period of this election. There is this popular saying which says the devil you know is better than the angel you dont know,  i think every Nigerians are just shying away from the main question which is ::how sure are you that the actual person in your mind is the right person to vote but i guess its just the frustration everyone is currently experiencing in the country that makes everyone think your chioce but the funny thing is that we can actually have the person in mind to vote.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: My vote, and my entire family vote, na for Peter Obi ooh, personally   I no dey vote for Obi because na him be the best, I dey vote for him because we need a change of leadership, na same group of people na im don dey lead us for several years now, same Old wine, dey go pour am put for new bottle, we all go think say na new wine, we go vote for the person, after everything, instead of things to better, things go dey hard more and more.This 2023 election na very crucial one, we must not afford to make another mistake, na Peter Obi na im be the only truly brand new wine wey we need to lead Nigeria, I personally believe say, him and his vice no go fail this country, make we all give them (Obi-Datti) our vote come 25th of February, 2023, we must reclaim and reset this country because Las Las, na youth get the country ooh.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 19, 2023, 07:38:53 PMI greet everybody in this symposium, I want to use this precious opportunity that has been given to me to tell us all mostly the Nigerians, that we all only have 157 hours to the election. Please everybody should vote for the right person, we should not sell our rights to anyone no matter how huge the offering may be. I have suffered a lot in the country comprising you no matter how rich you are, we all have suffered in this country. Both known strong parties can't afford to lose this coming election. The labor party candidate isn't forcing anyone to vote for him because the new Nigerian is in the hands of the youth just as our ex-president GOODLUCK EBELE JONATHAN did. So please let's do what is right. My vote goes to PETER OBI, the obedient and well-respected man. I love the statement the president made earlier about being neutral which is the best and also doing the right thing by voting for who we feel is the right person, not just voting because of our selfish interests, most of us have forgotten how to do the right thing just because of what we get from this politicians, every decision will make will all affect all of us lets not allow history repeat itself, I believe Nigeria can be better again the pen is already in our hand to write a new story.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: My brothers and sisters we have come a long way to this point. Nigeria and Nigerians needs stand up for better offer than the kangaroo politics we have been experiencing in the years past. Lots have happened and lots are yet to be corrected. This is the opportunity we have now at hand to make a quick correction if we care otherwise it will forever hunt back for the next eight years as it has been the tradition of our  politicians to rulefor two tenures before the thought of handing over comes to their head. This is the right time to make the right decision on who to pilot the affairs of our great nation to the height and position it ought to be. We made mistakes in the past and we have learnt our lessons in the hard way. Now is another opportunity at hand to made and effect the change we have longed for. The table is now in our court to make possible changes we want and longed for.Do not sell your conscience. Do not sell your vote.Vote wisely for a better Nigeria.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: There's nothing much to make noise about the election what we should be praying for is a peaceful and successful election without any dispute. APC and PDP are seriously desperate to have power all means, please if you are an APC or PDP supporter do not cause any fud because is just an election after which we are still one in same country so no need to panic causing problems here and there all in the name of politics yet you and I will still suffer in this country.Always vote whom your heart goes for don't allow anyone convinced you of anything.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Exactly do what is right on election day, and we all know what is right because I believe that before you can come to a pulling unit to cast your vote you must attain the age of 18years and above,so I don't think that at the age of 18and above you don't know what is right that means that person has no sense,but I believe we all know the right thing to do that very day, remember that whatsoever mistake You make on this coming Saturday which is our general election the correction is after 4 to 8years coming so think twice to avoid had I know....

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: We just hope the our votes are not being manipulated by the INEC officials because jagaban has money and can decide to buy the INEC body for easy win of the election but I know that if the masses votes for Obi and he wins nothing can INEC do because all eyes are on this forth coming election. This election is what will determine if Nigeria sufferings will continue due to bad leaders or it will come to an end. I see Obi as a man that is different from the other two candidates, I believed if he is given an opportunity, he will put smiles on the faces of Nigerians.

comments.author: Rockson1
comments.body: The best thing every citizen have to do is to vote right with out selling your civic right for chicken change they will offer u in election day our so called politicians failed in all areas because they believe people sold there votes for them to obtain any political position,that is why there policy can never be in favor of the citizens when u vote the right person it will be a good one because we need credible leaders that have leadership quality in them.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Some piple for area don gas for this election mata because even if we do the right thing on election day them go still use there bad hands take spoil the go things wey person do, some still believe say to cari ballot box run nai go give them better moni on election day and e still dy happen, as e be now I no know if nah the right thing we dy do or na the wrong thing we dy do nai make this contri dy as e be now... You vote your person wey you think say go fit that position without selling your vote them go still go do there own to favor them and to no even vote at all and the same thing go still happen, which we go do to dy on the safer side?
